message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $9500 for it. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm willing to come down a bit further to $9750. This price reflects the value of the product and gives you a good deal. Let's finalize this and make it happen!
Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still unable to go above $9500. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between?
